contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 9, 1961 D Chesterfield Rural District Council Invitation Contest (Grade Two)
Chesterfield Rural District Council Invitation Contest (Grade Two) 520 Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival chesterfield-rural-district-council-invi-968
Bradbury Hall, Chesterfield British Bandsman P4 16/9/1961 shows this as a Yorks v Midlands contest (advertised for many weeks beforehand as such) and gives result as 1st Linthwaite J.W.Morley 185, 2nd Cortonwood Colliery M.Thompson 182, 3rd West Bromwich G.A.Morris. Gives aggregate score with Grade 1 (Championship) as Yorks 1682, Midlands 1660. Grade 3 regarded as local section not included in aggregate.
May 7, 2011, 8:02 p.m. Aug. 20, 2016, 7:39 p.m.
1 West Bromwich Borough G. A. Morris
2 Strata Brass Unknown
3 Thoresby Colliery Unknown
